name: One fragile ship
description:
A spaceship game of 1 minute long at maximum, one button game.

You are trying to escape a canon and multiple ships. 

Your ship contains multiple systems, each one have a utility. 

Repair your systems by clicking on the sytem button.

You Win if you can escape ! (the bottom charging bar) You loose if your hull is 0%, if oxygene is at 0% and if the canon charging finish before your escape (the top bar).

The game is clearly unfinished for now. (last minute problem of render so the visual is to redo) The settings are not working exept for the volume.

I did everything in the game exept the sounds I bought and that I can use.

Software used : Audacity, blender, inkscape, unity
